item.title: Chris Ashton aiming for the white shirt again...
item.description:
Chris Ashton aiming for the white shirt again...

Saracens chief Mark McCall is backing "brilliant" Chris Ashton to force his way into Eddie Jones's first England squad after helping the club become the form team in Europe. Sarries defeated Oyonnax 55-13 on Saturday to take their unbeaten run to 10 matches in all competitions this season with Ashton grabbing a hatâ€‘trick in an eight-try European Champions Cup triumph.

item.title: Will Hartley replace Robshaw as England Captain?

Will Hartley replace Robshaw as England Captain?

Dylan Hartley may replace Chris Robshaw as England captain

item.title: Poor disciplinary record did not stop Martin Johnson captaining England - and it should not bar Dylan Hartley
item.description:
Poor disciplinary record did not stop Martin Johnson captaining England - and it should not bar Dylan Hartley

Of course, there was a different tenor to the game in those days, a sense of macho honour prevailing on the field that insisted grievances were sorted man-to-man. The arrival of countless TV cameras, super slow-mo replays and citing officers stationed in the proverbial bushes put paid to that sort of Wild West justice.
